item.title: New bill would mandate gyms to carry equipment for Americans with disabilities
item.description: Congressional Democrats are pushing for a massive overhaul to regulatory policy concerning Americans with disabilities.

item.title: Former presidential hopeful Marianne Williamson announces bid for DNC chair, looks to 'reinvent the party'
item.description: Former presidential hopeful Marianne Williamson announces a bid to become the next Democratic National Committee chair.

item.title: The Hitchhiker’s Guide to failing to elect a House speaker quickly
item.description: On the first day of the new Congress, representatives will vote for the speaker of the House as Mike Johnson fights to keep the job.

item.title: Texas man indicted in smuggling of dozens of illegal immigrants in locked tractor trailer
item.description: A Texas man is being charged with attempting to smuggle over 100 illegal immigrants into the U.S. in a locked tractor trailer.

item.title: State Department's 'Global Engagement Center' accused of censoring Americans shuts its doors
item.description: The State Department’s foreign disinformation center, accused by conservatives of censoring American citizens, shut its doors due to lack of funding t...
